dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be openly honest and transparent in all interactions.
Your FarTwin will be more reserved and cautious when communicating with others.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will openly display their emotions, often wearing their heart on their sleeve.
Your FarTwin will carefully control their emotional expression, rarely showing vulnerability.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will use a logical and analytical approach to solve problems.
Your FarTwin will rely on their intuition and instincts to guide problem-solving decisions.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others in social situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be outgoing and sociable, thriving in group settings.
Your FarTwin will prefer smaller, more low-key social gatherings or may even choose to avoid them altogether.

dimensions.label: Decision-Making Process
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will use a rational and evidence-based approach to decision-making.
Your FarTwin will rely on their intuition and instincts to guide decision-making choices.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin resolve conflicts?

options.description: Your FarTwin will stand up for themselves and assert their needs in conflict resolution.
Your FarTwin may avoid or sidestep conflicts altogether to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin learn and absorb new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin is a visual learner, best absorbing information through images and videos.
Your FarTwin is an auditory learner, preferring to learn through sound and music.

dimensions.label: Risk-Taking Behavior
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach risk-taking?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take bold and aggressive risks, often pushing boundaries to achieve success.
Your FarTwin will prefer to play it safe, taking calculated and cautious risks when necessary.
